sentence.Network_en: On November 30 - December 1, Venus will conjoin Jupiter in a once - a - year event.
sentence.Network_cn: 11月30-12月1, 金星会和木星一年一度的联合.

sentence.Network_en: All this will occur because on September 3, Saturn will conjoin the Sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有这些的出现,都是因为9月3日, 土星将与太阳平行.

sentence.Network_en: Brainstorm to unlock creative ideas for your career on March 15 when Mercury and Uranus conjoin.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French conjoindre, from Latin conjungere, from con- 'together' + jungere 'to join'

entry.def: If two or more things conjoin or if you conjoin them, they are united and joined together.

example.ex: The wisdom of the retired generals and backbench MPs conjoins...
example.tran: 退役将军和后座议员的智慧结合在一起。

example.ex: America's rise in rates was conjoined with higher rates elsewhere.
example.tran: 美国利率上涨，其他国家或地区的利率也高了起来。

auth_sentence.content: The materialists, who conjoin all thought with extension.

auth_sentence.content: Statement Ruffles maketh not a happy picture when starch and perspiration conjoin.
